Uses of Class
catalogue.Product

  • Packages that use Product 
    Package Description
    catalogue
    Common classes shared by 1 or more tiers
    clients.customer
    Classes that implement the customer client.
    dbAccess
    Classes that implement the persistence of data in the CatShop.
    middle
    Classes that implement the middle tier of the system.
    remote
    Classes that facilitate the communication between tiers of the system.

    • Uses of Product in catalogue

      Methods in catalogue with parameters of type Product 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean Basket.add​(Product pr)
      Add a product to the Basket.
      boolean BetterBasket.add​(Product pr)
      BetterBasket.add(Product pr) This method is designed to iterate through the basket size and order the items within in ascending ID number.
      static int BetterBasket.sort​(Product i, Product j)
      BetterBasket.sort(Product i, Product j) This method uses a basic bubble sorting approach to arranging the products within the basket.
